name: Candy Catch (HomeMadeGames)
description:
Candy Catch!  Catch falling candy to fuel your jetpack! Stay away from bats and ghost and collect as many candy as you can!

                Hey there, this is my first Game Jam. 

This project is a Submission for the Spooktober Game Jam. 

Please go into full screen for a better experience! 

Have Fun:)
